description:
Within The Rumor of the Eternal Sakura, Yachiyo and Kuroe find Iroha. However, she was swallowed by a Doppel nightmare. Yachiyo wakes up and has breakfast with Tsuruno, Felicia, Sana, and Iroha, but surprisingly Kuroe was there, too. Yachiyo and Kuroe realize they’re in a dream world with the Doppel nightmare and try to talk to Iroha.
Source: Funimation

titles.title: There Were Too Many to Carry
持ちきれないほどあったでしょ
